definition: South Korean-US
Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: China's Foreign Ministry expressed concern on Tuesday about the South Korean-U. S. drills.
sentences.chinese: 中國外交部對於週二的韓美聯合軍演表達了關注。

sentences.english: The Korea-U.S. alliance is a precious asset to both countries.
sentences.chinese: 韓美同盟是兩國的珍貴資產。

sentences.english: He also disclosed that the delegations of the DPRK and the US held one-on-one talks on the afternoon of July 28.
sentences.chinese: 他還透露，韓美代表團28日下午進行了雙邊會晤。

sentences.english: The KORUS agreement has yet to receive final approval from U.
sentences.chinese: 韓美協議尚未得到美國國會的最終批准。

sentences.english: North Korea is a buffer between the US forces in South Korea and China.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮是駐韓美軍和中國直接的緩衝帶。

sentences.english: China's Foreign Ministry expressed concern on Tuesday about the South Korean-U.S. drills.
sentences.chinese: 中國外交部對於週二的韓美聯合軍演表達了關注。

sentences.english: The pact, known as the Korea-U. S. Free Trade Agreement, was signed nearly four-and-a-half years ago.
sentences.chinese: 這份《韓美自由貿易協議》是近四年半前簽署的。

sentences.english: Five years passed since I graduated from University and join in Hanmi.
sentences.chinese: 走出校門加入韓美，不知不覺已走過五個年頭。
